p:
However, influencing the biosynthesis of plants metabolites via UV-C treatment depends over elicitation levels as well, and increased levels can cause cells death in plants
41, 69 . The same findings reported by Moon et al.
70 in in vitro cultures of Catharanthus roseus (L.), where UV-C radiations enhance phenolics and flavonoids accumulation. Recently, comparative results on synergistic effects of UV-C and other elicitors have also been reported by Khan et al.
1 , Nazir et al.
32 and Ullah et al.
33 .
